title: HB App Store
author: vgmoose
details:
Homebrew App Store allows you to download homebrew apps for HBL directly in the app. Installed apps can also be reinstalled, updated, or deleted.

Music by (T-T)b (google t tb chiptunes!)
Thanks to pwsincd, brienj, and dimok!

source code: https://github.com/vgmoose/hbas
This copy is precompiled for http://wiiubru.com/appstore
changelog:
2.2
- No more loading bar! Icons load on the fly
- Recovery mode added, accessed by pressing repeatedly L/R immediately after launching
- Switched to Chesto/resinfs for drawing UI and asset storage
- Updated Credits/About Screen
- Bugfixes around UI and unpacking files
